entry.title: Teddy Day Facebook Fb Timeline Covers 2014
entry.content:
best Teddy Day 2014 Facebook Profile Covers, Banners, Pictures

best Teddy Day 2014 Facebook Profile Covers, Banners, Pictures

My Darling,
You Are The Rock That Withstands Bad Times.
You Are The Most Striking Waterfall
During Good Times.
You Are My Friend,
My Lover, And My All.
Have A Heartfelt Valentine’s Day.

U wa watashi o sakujo shita baai, watashi wa by?ki de yaburu
U wa watashi o hoji suru baai, watashi wa by?ki ni furu
U ga watashi ni watashi by?ki isoide hitsuy?na baai wa,
U wa watashi o yobidashite inai baai, watashi wa by?ki de shinpai
U wa watashi o kizutsukeru baai, watashi wa by?ki ni naku Shikashi
U wa watashi o nokoshite iru baai, watashi wa by?ki de shib? shite imasu.
Shiawasena barentaind? shin’ainaru.
====================================
